Description:
Because a large number of MAC addresses are collided in hash table,
it needs to send more then 16384 SA packets to try maxinum entries of MAC address table.
Use MAC_Total_Number_of_MAC_Address + MAC_Number_of_Test_MAC_Address to try maxinum entries of MAC address table.
The time of DUT learn 1K MAC addresses. Unit: seconds.
The time of DUT learn max MAC addresses. Unit: seconds.
Default MAC address aging time. Unit: seconds.
Minimum MAC address aging time. Unit: seconds.
Maximum MAC address aging time. Unit: seconds.
Suport port move log or not. Argument: 1 (support), 0 (no support).
The type of static MAC address in MAC address table under CLI. Argument: Static, Config.
Default status of MAC learning on specified interface. Argument: Enabled, Disabled.
Support MAC learning on specified VLAN or not. Argument: 0, 1.
Default status of MAC learning on specified VLAN. Argument: Enabled, Disabled.
Reserve 1 MAC address for stacking or not. EX: ECS4510/ECS4620 reserve 1 MAC address entry for stacking, so the max MAC table is 16383.
